
mac-affix
===
Fix the component at a certain position  
  
  
### Parameters
**mac-affix-disabled**  
Type: `Expr`  
To unpin element (default false)  
  
**mac-affix-top**  
Type: `Expr`  
Top offset (default 0)  
  
**mac-affix-bottom**  
Type: `Expr`  
Bottom offset (default 0)  
  
**refresh-mac-affix**  
Type: `Event`  
To update the position of affixed element
